infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Ball House uses your location to show nearby basketball courts and count you as present when you're at a court.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Ball House needs background location access to automatically check you in when you arrive at a basketball court and count you as present.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Ball House needs background location access to automatically check you in when you arrive at a basketball court.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Ball House needs camera access to update your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Ball House needs photo library access to select profile pictures.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to show nearby basketball courts.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to show nearby basketball courts.
